# stopTracking()

**Instance Method**

Stops repeating the raycast query.

## Declaration

```swift
func stopTracking()
```

## Discussion

A tracked raycast updates continuously until you stop it explicitly by calling [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARTrackedRaycast/stopTracking()]. A raycast will automatically stop when:

- ARKit calls [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARSessionObserver/sessionWasInterrupted(_:)].
- You change the sessionâ€™s configuration.
- You deallocate the [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARTrackedRaycast].
title: stopTracking()
